sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import Grid from "@material-ui/core/Grid";
import TextField from "@material-ui/core/TextField";
import FormGroup from "@material-ui/core/FormGroup";
import {CompVariantCheckbox} from "../../common/CompVariant";
import FormLabel from "@material-ui/core/FormLabel";
import Box from "@material-ui/core/Box";
import Divider from "@material-ui/core/Divider";

function CompForm(props) {
    const {username, state} = props.inputs
    const {handleUsername, handleChange} = props.handlers

    return (
        <>
            <Grid container>
                <Grid item xs={12}>
                    <Box>
                        <FormLabel component="legend" style={{margin: '1rem 0',}}>Вариант отображения:</FormLabel>
                        <FormGroup row>
                            <CompVariantCheckbox variant='long' handler={handleChange} checked={state.long}/>
                            <CompVariantCheckbox variant='short' handler={handleChange} checked={state.short}/>
                        </FormGroup>
                    </Box>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12}>
                    <Box mt={2}>
                        <Divider variant="inset" light/>
                    </Box>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12}>
                    <Box mt={2}>
                        <TextField
                            required id="username" label="Никнейм"
                            fullWidth value={username} onChange={handleUsername}
                        />
                    </Box>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12}>
                    <Box mt={2}>
                        <TextField
                            required id="username" label="Никнейм"
                            fullWidth value={username} onChange={handleUsername}
                        />
                    </Box>
                </Grid>
            </Grid>
        </>
    )
}


export default CompForm
